reviews.customers_say: Customers find this sweater well-made and comfortable, noting it's not itchy and feels soft as cashmere.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing and wear them lots
items.body: I love these s/s sweater tops. Looks professional and feels almost like a tee shirt! Soft , fine weave, not itchy, thicker than a t-shirt but not too heavy. I got size m coffee color ( and then several other colors as well). I don’t want it oversized and I’m happy with size medium because it skims but not too fitted or tight. My measurements are 36d/dd 41 chest and 34 waist. These sweaters wash well in a sweater bag inside out in the machine wash eco mode. I always flat dry outside my sweaters - no noticeable shrinkage. I love to wear these it the spring and fall because they are too warm to wear in summer in my area because we don’t really need to use the ac so the room is not too cold. I get lots of wear and they still look great! I will need to use a sweater shaver on the fist one I bought but that’s is to be expected after multiple wears. Read more
items.author: Audrey

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars TTS, high quality, pretty
items.body: True to size with a relaxed fit. Very good quality - a thick sweater-like material, but not too thick if that makes sense. Soft and a nice medium coffee brown color. Impressive for Amazon. Definitely looking at more pieces from this brand. Recommended! Read more
items.author: Minty Minion

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars This has potential to be my new “go to”
items.body: For reference: 5’10, 36C and 160lbs I ordered a medium in coffee First things first. Pulling it out of the package, I was shocked at the softness. It felt expensive, soft and high quality. The color was beautiful. The length of the shirt is great. Easily can tuck in without being lumpy and frumpy. I tuck the front of the shirt into jeans or jean shorts and it’s the cutest thing. The sleeves are a good length. On the “model” in the photo, it looks like her sleeves hit a little further down than mine do. I would have preferred that but I have long arms. The length hits at about right where a cotton tee would. So I’m good with it. The style is very flattering and lightweight while giving off an expensive vibe. I need to order more colors. This has potential to be my go to shirt because I can dress it up or dress it down. So it’s super versatile. I washed it on a delicate cycle and actually did a low heat dry cycle. It didn’t shrink much so I was happy for that. I could have flat dried it and would have worked too. Read more
items.author: DJ

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cashmere-Like Material
items.body: I really liked this sweater shirt. I loved that it’s very soft, almost cashmere-like. It’s a thinner material so can be worn in summer as well. The shirt is stretchy and runs true-to-size. I have a shorter torso so the shirt was just a little longer on me than I’d like. There are great color selections! It’s a perfect shirt to wear to the office or out on the town. Read more
items.author: Kara

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Sweater Top for Work
items.body: I really like this sweater top for work. It’s soft, comfortable, and looks polished enough for the office. The fit is flattering without being too tight, and it’s easy to dress up with slacks or down with jeans. Great quality for the price and washes well too. Read more
items.author: MyriamR

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality X 10!!
items.body: The quality of this item is a 10 star. The sweater is soft and feels luxurious. I like how it fits. The sleeves are the right length as well as the length itself. Once I get the first sweater I went and ordered all the other colors. This type of sweater is a staple piece. It will never go out of style. Read more
items.author: Deb Hartz

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great feel & fit
items.body: Great sweater. Material is nice and perfect for work. Read more
items.author: Rosanna C.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars One of the best options on Amazon
items.body: I have purchased 3 different colors so far. Grey, Camel, Off-white. The camel is thinner, softer and slightly longer than grey. Both good quality and the off-white- big no. The charcoal grey is the best one of the 3. It’s well made, hasn’t pilled, fits well and high quality. Material is on the thicker/heavier side and not at all itchy or rough. Doesn’t have “fluffy” fly away fibers lifting off of it, or at least easily visible. It also doesn’t have a cheap sheen to it. The neck may be a little smaller than some would like but it doesn’t bother me. It’s also not cropped, maybe a bit long (depending on your preference) if you’re short. Would be great for tall women. I’m 5’0, short torso and reaches to hips. I French tuck so it’s fine. It runs true to size, if purchasing regular size will fit as it does on model in photo, not tight and not overly baggy and has some stretch to it. Sleeves are good length and not tight or short. Have worn and washed at least 10x (inside out, delicate, cold, lay flat dry, low temp iron or steam) and it’s still in great condition. In better condition and held up better than my B. Republic knits. Definitely recommend. The camel color is softer but has a slight fuzzy-ness appearance and texture. It’s also not as thick as the grey, material is slightly lighter/thinner. Not see through at all though. It fits fine but I prefer the way the grey one lays/fits. I also think it’s slightly larger and longer fitting so for tall girls, it would be great. Does have stretch to it. I should have gone down a size (medium instead of large) but was worried the neck might be too snug. It’s starting to slightly try to pill after two washes and one wear. I wash inside out, delicate, cold and line dry but to be fair, I used powered Tide instead of liquid and did a fluff dry for 5 minutes with the hard dryer balls rather than my wool balls. It’s not bad quality, just something to be aware of so it lasts longer. I’d recommend the camel one as well, just be mindful and demure when washing. The ivory one is too thin, completely see through and a very thin cheap material, not itchy but still cheap. Has a nylon sheen to it. I didn’t bother trying it on, just immediately returned it. Do not recommend. Read more
items.author: ElleKA

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
about_this_item:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Pale Blue, Blue-white, Grass Green, Apricot, Black, Coffee-5132, Coffee, A-light Turmeric, Black-white, Maple-leaf Red, Lake Blue, Acorn Violet, Raspberry Pink, Light Pink. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
